revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=CradlePoint |model=PHS2000W |revision= |manuf=U-MEDIA |manuf_model=WWR-376L |availability=unreleased |type=mobile hotspot |fcc_id=UXX-PHS2000W |ic_id= |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp= |pwr_conn=USB (unknown connector) |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Ralink |cpu1_model=RT3052 |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX25L12805DMI-20G |ram1=32 |ram1_brand=Winbond |ram1_model=W9825G6JH-6 |ram1_num= |expansion_if_types=Mini PCIe (half), USB 2.0 |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num=1 |expansion_usb_num=1 |expansion_pcmcia_num= |serial= |jtag= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip1_model=RT3052 |wi1_chip2_brand= |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |eth_none=true |eth_cpu= |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |lan_speed= |lan_ports= |wan_ports= |flags=WiMAX,battery |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=PHS2000W-XXX |default_ssid_regex=^PHS2000W-[a-f0-9]{3}$ |default_ch= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui= |oui_eth= }}The device has a '''Beceem''' BCSM250-1 on board for WiMAX capability.
Per the FCC submitted label, the default SSID is '''PHS2000W-XXX''' where '''XXX''' is the last three digits of the wireless interface MAC (lower case letters).
